definitions.definition: An edible plant , Lactuca sativa and its close relatives, having a head of green or purple leaves .
The leaves of the lettuce plant, eaten as a vegetable ; as a dish often mixed with other ingredients, dressing etc.
examples: I’ll have a ham sandwich with lettuce and tomato.
Twenty dollars an hour? That's a lot of lettuce !

definitions.definition: A strong yellow -green color , like that of lettuce (also called lettuce green).
Long , curly hair , as worn by followers of bro culture .

main_definition: An edible plant , Lactuca sativa and its close relatives, having a head of green or purple leaves .
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable , vegetable ) The leaves of the lettuce plant, eaten as a vegetable ; as a dish often mixed with other ingredients, dressing etc.
( uncountable , US , slang ) United States paper currency; dollars .
A strong yellow -green color , like that of lettuce (also called lettuce green).
( uncountable , slang ) Long , curly hair , as worn by followers of bro culture .
